title: Jonas Vingegaard’s incredible journey: From nervous, ‘worst guy in the peloton’ to silent assassin
content:
The Iceman cometh: how the Dane shelved his race-ruining anxiety and learned to lead at Jumbo-Visma. Just don’t compare him to Pogačar…

Read the full article at Jonas Vingegaard’s incredible journey: From nervous, ‘worst guy in the peloton’ to silent assassin on Velo.
author: Andy McGrath
